sections.title: Usage
sections.content: The command names start with "mbedtls_", for usage examples see the Knowledge Base.

sections.title: Generate a certificate signing request
sections.content:
```
$ mbedtls_cert_req filename=private_key subject_name=subject output_file=filename
```

Relevant how-to

sections.title: Generate a self-signed certificate
sections.content:
```
$ mbedtls_cert_write selfsign=1 issuer_key=private_key issuer_name=subject not_before=YYYYMMDDHHMMSS not_after=YYYYMMDDHHMMSS is_ca=1 max_pathlen=0 output_file=file
```

Relevant how-to
